dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5725 IH: Patient Freedom Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Jolly introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the individual health insurance mandate.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Patient Freedom Act of 2014.

section.header: Repeal of individual health insurance mandate

subsection.text: Section 5000A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:
This section shall not apply with respect to any month beginning after December 31, 2013.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to taxable years ending after December 31, 2013.
